org.TagCloud

Class TagCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • org.TagCloud.TagCloud
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants

    public class TagCloud
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
    A controller that constructs the TagCloud of Labels and handles mouse clicks, sending them on to TagClickListeners.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TagCloud

        public TagCloud()
        Constructor to call to create a new TagCloud. It used BorderLayout and puts the Slider in the top part and the scroll pane in the centre part.

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxWordsToShow

        public void setMaxWordsToShow(int wordsToShow)
        Sets the maximum number of words to show. The number is validated and set to be 1 or higher. Call showWords afterwards to update the tags being shown.
        Parameters:
        wordsToShow - the number of words to show in the range 1..Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      • setWordsList

        public void setWordsList(java.util.List<WeightedWord> weightedWords)
        This method receives the WeightedWord list of the words to be shown in the TagCloud and puts them on the container removing any that might have been there before.
        Parameters:
        weightedWords - The WeightedWord of the words to be shown.

      • getWordsList

        public java.util.List<WeightedWord> getWordsList()
        This method returns the WeightedWords List shown in the TagCloud.
        Returns:
        weightedWords The WeightedWord of the words to be shown.

        public void setMouseOverColor(java.awt.Color mouseOverColor)

        Parameters:
        mouseOverColor - the color to use on a mouseOverEvent

        public void removeTagClickListener(TagClickListener listener)
        Remove the specified TagClickListener.
        Parameters:
